dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.conditions.date
dt-option.summary: Set the condition names for the date column type

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.conditions.date` changes what will be displayed for the SearchBuilder's condition `-tag select` element for date, moment and luxon conditions.

dt-option.description:
This object sets the text for the condition names in the condition `-tag select` element. The defaults for each language option is listed below.
* `>: 'After'` * `<: 'Before'` * `between: 'Between'` * `null: 'Empty'` * `=: 'Equals'` * `!=: 'Not'` * `!between: 'Not Between'` * `!null: 'Not Empty'`
